title: Honour Capsule Bug
body:
I was given one today at the end of a game, and it doesn't show in loot.
I received a chest next game and that was fine.

I've tried restarting client, but no luck.

So my history with honour capsules so far is...
1) Ashe champion shard
2) Sivir champion shard
3) doesn't even get added to loot

Not much incentive for being honourable. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
I logged in to an honour capsule after posting this, thanks Riot.

It was Yi champion sharp, whoop-de-doo.

I swear, my hextech chests have great luck, my honour capsules are all terrible.
